Posts.Content: hi - i am 43 years old and i have had breast cancer twice. now i look for informations about diep reconstruction. how did your operation go..? i am from denmark and my english is not so good. did you get an operation without blood transfusion? how long does it take to recover - get over the operation? how about the result are you satisfied? My surgent want to operate both sides - did you get one or both sides..  my skin on the right side is not so good because of radiation - did you have the same problem? kerstin from denmark
Posts.Title: diep surgery
